ISSUE.TITLE: SVG image is not visible in default image on media setting > Product tab
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60.0 Steps to reproduce the problem: Step 1: Redirect on Admin panel > Configuration > Settings > Media setting > Enable Allow SVG uploads in admin area Step 2: Upload SVG image in Default image option and Click on Save button Step 3: Observe that image is not showing proper on media setting admin side Step 4: Observe that Uploaded SVG image is showing proper on Public side Expected result: Uploaded SVG image should be display on Admin side Please refer attachment ![media setting](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/121164051/208899891-8ca96627-fa1e-4869-ba61-0d6701f21a10.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #6473 Disabled throwing an exception when glyph is not available in debug mode

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6477 Added width limit for SVG image container
